name: Color Or Color Name
description:
Choose the correct color depending on whether you have to choose the color that the word is or the color that it says. Your mind can play against you, don't be your own enemy. 

You have to choose the color that says when there is a box around it and if there is no box you have to choose the color that is the word.

4 game modes:

  • Normal: with 4 colors and you have  30 and 60 seconds timers.
  • Hard: with 6 colors and you have 30 and 60 seconds timers.

Each mode has it's own highscore and in every game the colors are random. You win more points for answering faster but if you fail you loose some, so be careful.

Post your highscores if you want and hope you enjoy it!

PD: My goal for this game jam was making a settings menu, i never do one. So if something dont work, it's because i'm dumb xD

Made for Mini Jam 111: Colors²
